name: CliffhangerPro
description:
Welcome to Cliffhanger, an entertaining word game to test your spelling, vocabulary and logical ability.

The challenge is to guess the word by discovering the component letters. To help you Cliffhanger provides statistics on the letter occurrence.

But be warned, some of the words are fiendishly difficult!

MAIN FEATURES
Cliffhanger contains 600 words
Simple easy to play interface
Amusing animations
If you are stuck, get a hint or look up the word statistics
Look up the meaning of obscure words in the online dictionary
